name: Vulkan: Lost Planet
description:
Arriving at the Lost Planet, Vulkan is surrounded by an variety of hostile creatures in his last mission as an intergalactic bounty-hunter.

KEY FEATURES
- Change your weapons anytime rolling the Weapons Fate Dice skill.
- Six weapons each one with with unique abilities.
- Increasing you weapons damage by rolling the Power Dice skill.
- Upgrade your character to increase your chances of surving.
- A new type of Arena everytime you die.
